name: Liturgy
description:
Liturgy is a fantasy visual novel, where you play as a young acolyte on a journey exploring the different places of worship in a certain area, a tradition to place trainees in the service of the deities they find a kinship with or have an interest in. Perhaps you'll decide to settle in the hall of the World-Eater, or perhaps find fulfillment in the court of the Phoenix. But you'll never know unless you go.

Currently in development! Has the introduction and the first location.

Entry for the Summer My First Game Jam 2021. This iteration of the game was made over the course of two weeks.
